features: 【500 Super Classic Games】This mini retro handheld game console has 500 built-in classic games. The classic game allows you to play 500 games without any advertising or additional costs, including Arcade retro games, puzzles, arcades, shooting, racing, fighting, adventure etc. Each game is classical in your childhood. More choice for playing, recall the wonderful childhood memories and have funny game time with kids or friends, You can have a break in the spare time.

【Support 2 Players & Play on TV】 There are extra game controller in the package, support 2 people play games in the same time. Let you have fun playing a two-player game. If you want to enjoy a more lively and exciting video game experience, you also can connect console to the TV so that you can enjoy the funny and lively video game in bigger screen.(NOTE:!!!The controller only functions when in Two-player mode. If the remote cannot be used, please check whether it is used in the correct mode.)

【Mini & Easy to Carry 】This mini retro game console is only 150g. Compact and lightweight handheld video games console, mini body, easy to carry it anywhere, deal with boring time. The perfect choice for enjoying childhood fun in airplanes, camps, travel or on the way to work. You can put it in your pocket or bag, and carry it with you on the way to work, free time, the best choice for relaxing yourselves.

【1020mAh Rechargeable Battery】Portable Classic Game Console built-in 1020 mAh Rechargeable lithium battery. The mini game console comes with USB cable, charging time is about 1~3 hours, 5~8 hours of continuous game play. which is ideal for frequent business trips, travel, travel, camping. Never worry about running out of battery again.

【Perfect Gift for Kids & Adults】 The retro handheld game console not only bringing funny game time to children but also waking up wonderful childhood memories to the 80s and 90s adults, as well as releasing their life pressure. This handheld video games console for kids is perfect gift choice on Birthday, Christmas and New year festival moments or any occasion. Buy it now to get: (1) Game Console; (2) USB Cable; (3) AV Output Cable; (4) User Manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Classic Handheld Game Console Takes You Back To The Childhood ! Retro Handheld Game Console, Portable Retro Video Game Console with 500 Classical Games 3.0-Inch Screen Rechargeable 1020mAh Battery Support for TV Connection and Two Players. Built-in 500 Games: Include 500 classical games, creating full fun for both kids and adults!3.0-inch Color Screen: It allows you to enjoy the exciting and interesting games without hurting your eyes.Support 2 Players & Play on TV: It allows 2 players to share the game at the same time or connect to TV enjoying the games with the big screen!It features a colorful LCD screen and supports AV output, not only giving you a high-quality picture and gaming experience, but also making you more stress-free and make you feel better. Meanwhile, you could bring it everywhere with slim design.Perfect for kids, kids, adults, family, friends' birthdays, Christmas, it's the perfect gift choice for New Years and festive moments. The interactive entertainment of game competitions enhances parent-child interaction and brings more laughter and joy to the whole family.

Package Included: Retro Game Console X 1Game Controller X 1AV Output Cable X 1USB Charging Cable X 1User Manual X 1Battery X 1 Portable Handheld Video Game Console 500 IN 1 Classic Handheld Game Product Specification: Color: BlueScreen: 3.0-InchBuilt-in: 500 GamesLanguages: English/ChineseWorking time: 5-6 hoursCharging time: About 2 hoursBattery: 1020 mAh lithium-ion rechargeable batteryGame type: Racing Games; Adventure Games; Fighting Games; Shooting Games ect. You may find some duplicate games in it, because these games are different versions and have different fun.

Support 2 Players & Play on TV This retro handheld game console allows two players to share the game at the same time, or connect the 3.0-inch screen video game console to the TV so that you can enjoy the fascinating and lively video game in bigger screen. NOTE:!!!The controller only functions when in Two-player mode. If the remote cannot be used, please check whether it is used in the correct mode. The controller only games that support Two-player mode, you can played with another person. Once use the console to control, the other use the controller to control, doesn't work in the menu system.

NOTES for Connecting to TV 1. Connect the cable controller & the AV cable to the Video Game Console; 2. Connect the red terminal of the AV cable to the red terminal of the television (AUDIO); 3. Connect the yellow terminal of the AV cable to the the yellow terminal of the TV (VIDEO); 4. Switch the TV channel to the audio / video channel and turn on the TV and the handheld mini game console. TIPS This game console does not have the function to save the progress of the game.(When you quit the game, all progress will be zero.)To avoid to burn out the IC of the game machine, do not turn on them before you finish the steps of cable connections.The AV terminal interfaces on television could be rusty or have patina because of the rare using, which will cause poor connection for electricity. If this happens, you should remove the rust before using it.

The Perfect Retro Handheld Game Console For Kids! There is always one game that you like! It will give you a fantastic gaming experience, relieve your stress from life and work, as well as bring back your wonderful childhood memories.No kid will refuse the joy of a game console, just as we did when we were kids!The game console is easy to carry and can be charged by a variety of devices without space limitation. It can be used in many scenarios, such as on the road, on the way to work, when you need to relax after work, or when you share happiness with friends! As well,you can plug and play on your big TV screen with the included AV output cable when you are on a vacation at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the gameboy
reviews.reviewText: Loved the price and the memories associated with it. The grandkids are having a great time. Multiple games is such a plus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worked for 1 day
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my son for Christmas, he was able to play Christmas Day, although it acted very sketchy and the screen whited out once after 10 min of play...then turned back on after a charge. But the very next day it does not even try to turn on, even after charging. HUNK of JUNK

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun retro unit!
reviews.reviewText: This retro unit is pretty fun. The games do repeat, but there are still plenty to choose from.It hooks up to the tv easily and has a wired controller, so it's a lot of fun to pass around and take turns with. The settings and games don't save, so it's a restart each time. Not really a big deal when considering the very low price of this console and that only hardcore retro gamers are really going to want to play for endless amounts of time, so they'd know to buy a fancier setup.For me, I'm going to pick up a box tv and create a retro gaming area in our gaming room, as I have another old school gaming console that could use an older tv to really shine.This looks like a gameboy, so makes me feel some nostalgia when I see it. I've really enjoyed playing the games from my childhood/youth, because I'm actually good at a lot of those, whereas a lot of the newer games just have too many buttons/menus/etc for me to immerse myself in them and just play for fun.I'd recommend this for any age. I think that kids and teens would get a kick out of it, plus you could tell them how you used to have to walk to school every day, uphill both ways, in the snow, lol. Adults will have fun playing the games from the childhood.

reviews.reviewerName: Game console was a big hit with my grandkids!!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandkids loved the game consoles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Nintendo games
reviews.reviewText: I liked that there are 500 Nintendo games in this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price!
reviews.reviewText: PROs:- Takes you back to the past with some classic games.- Allows you to play some classic games you might have missed as a kid.- Cheap entertainment. You will get your 15-20 dollars worth.- Plugging into the TV is cool but not practical for long periods.CONs:- At this price point, the overall build quality and battery life are not great.- No save options. Better be ready to binge near a power source if you want to see the ending to your favorite game.- D Pad does not work consistently.- Screen is not good on the eyes.Overall, I would recommend this to someone who wants a cheap and temporary trip down memory lane. Or someone wanting to introduce classics to their kids who won’t have an attention span that is bothered by no save options. Also, when it breaks, and it will, you won’t be terribly upset about the 15-20 dollar investment. I have been to fairs that want to charge hundreds for held-held devices to help people dip their toes in the waters of nostalgia.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nostalgic little console that hubby and I have in the room.Connects easily and comes with one controller as well as console. Can also connect to a monitor screen.Cheap in price, perfect way to pass time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great retro console!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Trovono Retro Handheld Game Console and I have to say, it has been one of the best investments I've made in a while. With 500 classic FC games, I've found myself spending countless hours reliving my childhood memories of playing these games with my friends. The 3.0-inch screen is the perfect size and the graphics are surprisingly clear and crisp.One of the standout features for me is the ability to connect the console to my TV, which makes it perfect for playing with friends or family. The rechargeable battery also lasts a decent amount of time, so I don't have to worry about constantly charging it.The design of the console is sleek and stylish, and the controls are easy to use. I also love that it supports two players, so I can enjoy the games with a friend.Overall, I highly recommend the Trovono Retro Handheld Game Console to anyone who loves classic gaming and wants to take a trip down memory lane.
